title: Women in tech: Why it’s time for companies to try a new gender-equality playbook - YourStory
content: Women in tech: Why it’s time for companies to try a new gender-equality playbook  YourStory
description: In any industry, biases that are based on gender can make people think that a certain gender isn’t as qualified or good at a job. Stereotypical thoughts lead people to believe a specific gender lacks the skills or qualities that the job requires.
